title: Some Google Chrome ad blockers could stop working next year
description: Google Chrome update may disrupt browsing experience from January 2023.

description: Intel may exit more businesses as CEO predicts more potential future strife.

description: Ready for download from Windows Insider, the latest Preview Build adds animations to Settings and fixes some bugs.

title: This money-saving Microsoft Edge update might finally motivate you to switch from Google Chrome
description: Microsoft Edge Wallet will automatically apply coupons and save you money.

title: Fake websites are posing as crypto exchanges to drain victim wallets
description: Cybercriminals are using fake versions of exchanges such as Coinbase, Gemini, Kraken, and MetaMask.

title: Lazarus hackers are using Log4j to hack US energy companies

title: Amazon Prime Video finally adds Dolby Vision HDR on TVs… for 3 shows
description: We've confirmed that Dolby Vision HDR is now available in Amazon Prime Video for a scant few TV shows… but it's not on phones yet.

title: Bethesda reactivates classic multiplayer FPS Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory
